events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I expected.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning this refund case to the customer support agent responsible for order issues.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help get this resolved quickly for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
My order number is 12345AB and I’ve attached a clear photo showing the wrong product delivered to me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund within 3 business days and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and refund offer. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the return label.
The refund has been processed and the return label emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and the return label. Please inform us if everything is satisfactory.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
